abstract: Comprehensive TypeScript refactoring and modernization guide designed for AI agents and LLMs. Contains 43 rules across 8 categories, prioritized by impact from critical (type architecture, narrowing) to incremental (quirks and pitfalls). Each rule includes detailed explanations, real-world examples comparing incorrect vs. correct implementations, and specific impact metrics to guide automated refactoring and code generation. Covers TypeScript 4.x-5.x features, compiler performance optimization, type-safe error handling, and runtime patterns.
